name: (08/12) Casey Joint
description: Help the cat burglar Trilby regain relevance in the age of computers as his new sidekick Casey Joint, a skilled hacker with the ability to control doors, computers, cameras and alarms. Play numerous hacking minigames that all in some way involve randomly mashing the keyboard in an attempt to simulate the cliched computer hacking you see in movies. The eighth game in my 12 games in 12 months Dev Diary challenge.
